sub_title: Brand Builder. Business Leader. Women Champion
summary:
I am passionate about building brands and exciting portfolios; this is why I have spent the last 2 decades doing just that across a broad range of sectors including advertising, telecoms and fast moving consumer goods.

Through the course of my career, I have had the opportunity to work in several countries across different continents leading and developing cross functional teams to help brands succeed in competitive markets.

One can easily sense my pulse as I work with my teams to define and shape brand and portfolio strategy and unlocking growth opportunities through innovation.

I am also a firm believer and advocate for diversity and equitable opportunities in the workplace; I use my voice and experience to give courage to women supporting and challenging them to see things differently as they navigate the complex terrain of corporate culture and emerge as business leaders.
